item.title: HackTheBox - Soccer
item.description: En este articulo vamos a estar resolviendo la maquina soccer de HTB. Comprobamos conexion con la maquina victima: ❯ ping -c 1 10.10.11.194 PING 10.10.11.194 (10.10.11.194) 56(84) bytes of data. 64 bytes from 10.10.11.194: icmp_seq=1 ttl=63 time=81.0 ms --- 10.10.11.194 ping statistics --- 1 packets transmitted, 1 received, 0% packet loss, time 0ms rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 81.018/81.018/81.018/0.000 ms Vamos a realizar nuestro escaneo con nmap: ❯ nmap 10.10.11.194 Nmap scan report for 10.
